= Aprof perfomance =
We run [http://www.dis.uniroma1.it/~demetres/experim/dsp/README.txt DSP] with [http://code.google.com/p/aprof/source/browse/trunk/benchmark/dsp/scripts/aprof_benchmark1.txt this input]. We measure with the _time_ command.

== Build DSP and run under Aprof ==
{{{
cd path/to/aprof/benchmark/dsp
make valgrind
time ../../aprof-bin bin/dsp < scripts/aprof/aprof_benchmark1.txt
}}}
See aprof log under _benchmark/dsp/bin/_

== Platform ==
  * Macbook 5,1
  * Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     P7350  @ 2.00GHz
  * 2GB DDR3
  * Ubuntu 11.04 *32bit* 

== Perfomance reference ==
{{{
DSP(native): real 0.36 sec
DSP(callgrind): space 35mb ~  time real 16.08 sec
DSP(memcheck): space 99mb ~ time real 9.85 sec
}}}

Aprof based on [http://www.pintool.org/ PIN]:
{{{
DSP(aprof-PIN): space 128mb ~ time real 4m57.972s ~ FAST_BUFFERING=1, CCT=1, MEM_TIME=1, TIME_GETTIMEOFDAY
DSP(aprof-PIN): space 126mb ~ time real 4m16.767s ~ FAST_BUFFERING=1, TIME_GETTIMEOFDAY
}}}
